title: Software Engineer Student
aboutDescription: I am a dedicated student aspiring to build a career as a software engineering. I am eager to take on challenging tasks and seek opportunities to develop my skills both in my field and in other areas. I take great pride in my strong work ethic, which is reflected in my commitment to producing high-quality work. I am a calm problem solver by nature and strongly believe that the best solutions arise from collaboration and open communication.

experienceBoxes.title: Processing Operator
experienceBoxes.text: I was responsible for inspecting and repairing electronic components. Workdays lasted 12 hours and I needed to stay alert and focused to ensure that the final products were flawless and of high quality.

experienceBoxes.title: Assistant ( PCR )
experienceBoxes.text: As a COVID-19 testing assistant, I conducted daily tests for 100-200 people. I was responsible for sample handling, participating in the entire testing process, and supporting public health initiatives.

experienceBoxes.title: Receptionist
experienceBoxes.text: I assisted approximately 200-400 people daily in performing COVID-19 vaccinations. My duties included assisting customers, ensuring their well-being, and making sure they felt comfortable and safe.

experienceBoxes.title: Warehouse Worker
experienceBoxes.text: My duties included picking frozen goods according to customer orders, ensuring accuracy and timely delivery. I also maintained order in the department and correctly placed products in the warehouse.

experienceBoxes.title: Mailing and Enveloping
experienceBoxes.text: My tasks included sorting letters and packages, opening and sealing envelopes, and preparing mail for shipment.
